asap.faceengine

Class FaceAnimationPlanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.faceengine.FaceAnimationPlanPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    asap.realizer.planunit.PlanPlayer

    public class FaceAnimationPlanPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements asap.realizer.planunit.PlanPlayer
    Specialized PlanPlayer that handles conflict resolution for TimedFaceUnit and manages the FaceController
    Author:
    hvanwelbergen
